title: GTA Vice City Portable Multi Player Edition v2.1
description:
=================================================================
GTA Vice City Portable Multi Player Edition v2.1
=================================================================
Totally Uncut- Exclusive to Demonoid members only
=================================================================

-----------------------------------------------------------------
New Features:
-----------------------------------------------------------------
> Visually enhanced
> Integrated updates for multiplayer client and server (VCMP)
> Added "Kill Switch" to counter multiplayer crashes
  (Please read "How to use Kill Switch.txt")
-----------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------
Description:
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Grand Theft Auto: Vice City is a sandbox-style
action-adventure computer and video game
designed by Rockstar North (formerly DMA Design)
and published by Rockstar Games.
-----------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------
Stats:
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Language: 				English

No. of files before extraction: 	10

Size before extraction: 		624 MB

No. of files after extraction: 		1449 files
					49 folders
					6 shortcuts

Size after extraction: 			1.19 GB
-----------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------
Why choose this release over others?
-----------------------------------------------------------------
There are several other GTA Vice City (GTA VC) releases out
there. Some go way over 700MB (size of a standard CD) and some
are less than 300MB. The facts that make this release special
are:
> Portable: runs from a portable storage
> Out of the box multiplayer
> All the contents are included (totally uncut)
Includes all the radio stations, videos, dialogues etc.
> Easily fits in a standard 700MB CD
-----------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------------------------------------------------------
Known issues:
-----------------------------------------------------------------
> wav2raw.exe is seen as an exploit by chatty antivirus softwares
although it is a command line audio decompressor. This file
is an essential tool and the sound in the game will not work
if this tool does not extract the sound files correctly.
This file doesnÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t harm your PC in any way.
I have scanned my whole PC with AVG and Kaspersky before and
after (not during) extracting these files, and there was no
sign of threat.

> Takes painfully long with Kaspersky Internet Security (KIS)
running as opposed to Norton 360. I think KIS scans each and
every file before execution.

> At this moment, the known trouble maker is Kaspersky. Neither
AVG nor Norton see wav2raw.exe as a threat.

> If you are too paranoid, possible way to extract this game,
keeping peace of mind, would be to disconnect from the internet,
disable Kaspersky or similar chatty antivirus softwares,
install the game, scan PC with your favorite antivirus software,
resume everything. 
-----------------------------------------------------------------
